arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your Shadow Damage Over Time effects have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Essence. 
Damage from your {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} Key Passive will always generate {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} Essence.
Your Shadow Damage Over Time effects have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Essence.
